name: compras-verdu
description: Sistema de compras a proveedores - monorepo

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix frontend && npm install --prefix backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix frontend
scripts.ci: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run test --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run test --prefix frontend
